content: Using Starred ItemsStarring your favorite events, locations, and resources allows you quick access to the items you work with most often. Starred items are available as the default list in the Events, Locations, Resources, and Organizations views. Your starred items in 25Live Mobile are the same as those in the full version of 25Live.The  icon indicates the item is currently "starred"Tap or click the  icon to un-star an itemTap or click the  icon to star an itemstar, un-star, favorite, unfavorite
title: Using Starred Items
